Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: It's very easy to use but has lots of  extra features too. Pictures are clear and sharp. Sound is high quality too.

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 12 items, Camera includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens and Full HD 1080p Video - Plum (import, backed by Hot Deals Electronics 1 year guarantee)
4 AA High Capacity 2950mah Batteries with Rapid Charger - Well Padded Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets, & Neck Strap - Professional Wrist Grip Strap
32 Gigabyte SDHC (Secure Digital High Capacity) Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader -  Universal Memory Card Wallet
Full Size 50" Tripod w/case - HDMI Cable for High Definition TV connection - Flexible Mini Table Top Tripod - Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon COOLPIX L820 16 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Zoom Lens & HD Video - Plum (Import) + 4 AA High Capacity Batteries with Quick Charger + 11pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
